panels.description: This shows the rate of how many CVs has been updated within the last month
panels.title: Overview CVs updated per month

panels.description: This charts shows the turn-around latency when user app calls Dapr API. For example, you can understand each statestore and service invocation performance.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le, app_id, method, path) (rate(dapr_http_server_latency_bucket{app_id=~"$dapr_app_id", job="dapr"}[5m])))

panels.title: Outbound request latency (App->Dapr) (95p, 75p)

panels.description: Displays all the requests received within each service
panels.title: Http requests

panels.description: This charts shows the inbound request latency from Dapr to App. You can analyze App's API endpoint performance.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le, app_id, method, path) (rate(dapr_http_client_roundtrip_latency_bucket{app_id=~"$dapr_app_id", job="dapr"}[5m])))
histogram_quantile(0.75, sum by(le, app_id, method, path) (rate(dapr_http_client_roundtrip_latency_bucket{app_id=~"$dapr_app_id", job="dapr"}[5m])))

panels.title: Inbound request latency (Dapr -> App) (95p, 75p)

panels.description: This charts shows request rate (rps) when Dapr runtime calls User app HTTP endpoints.
panels.title: Inbound request rate (Dapr -> App) (RPS)

panels.description: This charts shows completed request rate (rps) when User app calls Dapr.
panels.title: Outbound request rate (App -> Dapr) (RPS)
